content.detailedDescription: Strange lights over longmont co.
content.summary: Witness lights in sky moving unlike any known man made object. made 90 degree turns.

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 10 years old when it happend: i took my dog timmi to a night walk before sleeping. it was about 22:00sh i walked my dog to do his needs and then i lay on the grass next to my dog watching the sky...
sudenly, above the buildings behind me, i saw this beatiful flying glowing carpet in details! over my head from south to north smoodly, with no sound at all! i looked around to see other people on the street to share this view but the street was empty. i rise up to see if anybody is on the carpet but i saw nothing.
the saight was amazing and i had no fear of it when it happend.
i am 47 years old now, i have 2 daughters, i was in the army as en officer rank major in the israeli defence force.
i don't need publish or anything else, i didnt tell anyone my story because it sounds like from a legent or kids story. only lately i started to see your program on t.V and decided to share my story hoping to find someone in the world with the same story as mine.
content.summary: Flying carpet above buildings from south to north

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone today: on november 19, 2015 at 7:40 p.M., the witness was working on a cell tower in lawson, missouri along with two other technicians. they were pulling equipment up using a rope and pulleys, and while two of the technicians were looking up the tower while pulling items upward they saw an unidentified craft flying directly overhead at 90 degrees. the primary witness stated that had they not been in that exact position and looking up they would never have known the craft was there because it made absolutely no sound whatsoever. the two men then watched the object for approximately 8 to 10 seconds, as it flew from east to west towards the setting sun. as it went into the sunlight they lost sight of it.  the third man on the scene did not see the craft since he was not near them at the time.

the witness said that he thought the object was at least Â¼ mile wide and was flying at approximately 5,000 feet at least 200 mph. the object was a dark grey or black color and had no lights on it. it was a triangular shape and it flew with the point of the triangle heading forward. he thought it may have been a tr-3b aircraft, but thought he should report it to mufon. the witness did not obtain any video or photos. note that whiteman afb is not far away from this location.
content.summary: Silent triangular object over lawson, mo

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to take a picture of the sun... the sky was very clear... i was not even aware of the 'object' until i took the picture... then i saw it.. with those lights. i have never seen anything like this before.
the object then changed direction slightly and vanished.
content.summary: Very clear object in unusual shape with lights on it... there was nothing else on the sky at the time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting in-laws in whiteville, tn, a small town in western tennessee sometime around july 1972. late in the afternoon, my mother in law received a call from a friend across town saying that something was flying over the town. we all went out into the back yard. a large black object was overhead. it was so low, seemed just over the tree tops and so large that all but the leading edge could be seen. the sides and far side were obscured by the trees and houses. there were no lights or sound. it was flying in a straight line very slowly. we knew it was not anything man made. this was the early 70s, nothing could stay airborne and move that slowly. i did not feel frightened, a little in awe but not enough to remain out there to watch it pass fully overhead. i had a baby at the time and may have had to go in and tend to him; i don't remember that part. but i do remember that my mother in law was calling everyone she knew to go out and look. the whole town had to have known about it. 
i don't think any reporting was involved. who would you call? no one seemed to make a big deal about it including myself. 
over the years, i never really thought about it until i sat the movie, independence day. the bottom surface of the mother ship was what i remembered seeing flying over whiteville. lower and probably not as large as the movie mother ship but the same color and shape.
content.summary: Large flat irregular surfaced object flying slowly over town

content.detailedDescription: It was around 2130 i had just put my son to sleep and saw my husband off to work and went out on the front porch to admire a new christmas wreath i had hung earlier in the evening. it was a very bright night, the night before a full moon and the sky was exceptionally clear with many stars visible. i live in a rural area with no neighbors so decided to walk down the driveway and up the road a ways.I noticed a very bright star like object that i assumed was the north star but as i watched for a while i noticed movement as well as color changes and blinking of the light. pulsing at times and almost spinning at others. it hovered for long periods and most movements were slow and very smooth, sometimes appeared to bounce. with thanksgiving approaching i expect increased air traffic and am familiar with aircraft as i am a us navy aviation veteran as is my husband. this was not familiar to me. and as aircraft in the area would approach the object would sometimes dim completely or start to rapidly blink. i watched it for approximately two and a half hours. it then appeared to move further away (north)of where i live.
content.summary: Observed very bright star-like object assumed was the north star. object was slow moving starting out solid white then flashing blue at times. would appear to almost bounce up and down at times. moved side to side and up and down. lights were random

content.detailedDescription:
Gentlemen:
this star like ufo was seen on nov 24th at 11:45 pm (brightest object in the sky: this ufo moved up,down,left,right,going around in a circle blinking all the time and it took up approx (1 inch of space):

*****important note*****
this ufo then reappeared on nov 25th at 5:15 am.Doing the same thing:

*****note*****
that means this u.F.O re-appeared in approx (5 hours) which means
this ufo circled the globe in (5 hours) (impossible) right: but it really happened as indicated:

note: previous ufo reports on this ufo = case #71325,case # 71666, 
case # 72631:

i really would like to know what this u.F.O. is:
previous reports were also in a south east direction:
thank you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: *****important note*****

content.detailedDescription: It was at 10.30 am as i was leaving the roof, i casually looked at the sky, in the direction of university, and suddenly spotted just above, approx 500 meters, under the clouds, a big bright sphere or ball, the size of four commercial airplanes. it was stationary, seemed a big balloon, very shiny, reflecting. it did not rotate. it did not pulse. then, it zoomed off at incredible speed across the sky towards luqa. and just disappeared. the whole episode lasted 2 seconds, maybe 2.5. it did not give me time to react. it had a fascinating effect on me, but latent.
content.summary: Sphere/ball shaped,shiny,metallic, 100 m in diameter, stationary & zoomed off at speed.

content.detailedDescription: Relax. was heard being spoken will watching football game on tv. over and over maybe twice. he made a video of the event.
content.summary: Audio on tv

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I need to tell you i already turned this in .But however they have returned a couple of times since then . they weren,t as bright and obviously paying attention as the one i turned in.I think they may be watching either beaulieu or me.I got a camera for christmas that records:)they have the ability to muttle my thoughts and change appearances or to mess with my biological semetry.They have the ability to change people.I think they have been with me for a while as i reported in the beginning.
content.summary: had walked out to lunch about11:30

content.detailedDescription: Driving home i noticed three bright lights in the sky, interested in what they were i stopped to take a picture. upon stopping and taking one picture i was stunned when the lights descended and approached the vehicle...At this point i dropped my phone and began driving fearing for my life. after coming within 100 feet of the vehicle the disc shaped object emitting the yellow orange and blue lights then took off into the sky and was not seen again. as soon as i had cell service i frantically called my husband in a panic and told him of the event in tears and still fearing for my life. this is not something that will ever be forgotten, and has definitely changed my perspective on such reports as this. the only photo i managed to get is poor quality but the object can be seen below the full moon, and light can be seen on the ground below the craft, above where my headlights were shining.
content.summary: Three bright lights descended upon vehicle made an approach then ascended.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the bus stop at the intersection of westminster and euclid waiting for the northbound euclid bus when i noticed some strange lights in the shape of a square. my bus stop is directly under the flight path of incoming commercial and private planes heading toward john wayne airport in santa ana, so i am used to seeing planes and helicopters fly over. what caught my attention was the fact that the object stopped very abruptly in mid air and then went back the way it came. i also noticed that none of the lights were blinking, and i know that planes and helicopters have blinking lights. there was another witness which was a young man that showed up on a skateboard a few minutes before i saw the object. when i first sighted the object, i asked him if he could see it and he said that he could. we both watched the object for a few minutes, which would hover, then fly very quickly towards us and then away, then it would wobble from side to side. it then descended very quickly in the area between euclid and taft. i looked at the young man and said "i don't know what that was." after a few more minutes, it ascended again and performed the same manuevers, and then once again descended to the same spot as before. i don't know if it actually landed or not, but i told the young man that i thought it was an rc toy, to which he agreed. the object did not show up again. i still don't know if it was an rc toy or not, but it was interesting to watch.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright lights in a square pattern moving quickly and erraticly

content.detailedDescription: I was ready to go home from my cousins house, i happened to be walking to my car and noticed the sky was very bright, i looked up and i saw a his circle around the moon, something i never seemed before! i ran back to get my cousin to witnes it with me. i tried taking pictures and but it wasn't visible until i changed the setting to negative, and there the camera could capture the flying object. when i zoomed in i could see the moving object like a disc. i felt a bit scared but reminded myself not to feel any type of fear. i walked to my car and i could still see the circle, it was 1am when i got home and i could still see the circle.
content.summary: I noticed a big circle around the moon, when i used my camera with negative setting the lens would capture the flying object

content.detailedDescription: Up early getting motorhome ready for trip was looking at three brite stars in line somewhat spanning about half horizon caught sight of small object heading north to south very small no lights looked sort rounded but only saw maybe three seconds it went between the two of the stars i was watching so i could no relocate. third str was to the west of me all the sudded strated moving high rate speed towards my location just bright light moving fast.As i looked up i saw tiangle shape object above real light cloud cover directly above me i live on commersial jet east west corridor so i see jets all night as they follow abobe i 8 into san diego and this thing was about two times faster left no trails or noise.It was sharp edged had two white lights at each rear corner bright with two white strobes right to the inside of white lights and in the middle a red strobe.I got perfect veiw as it flew over and watched it until out veiw in west.Amazing looked three to four times larger then airliner at altitude it looked to be flying it was longer then wide 200ft long x 100 ft wide rear tips amazing note lights diamiter looked liked it was about third as wide as objectand red light stayed on after each strobe flash light was bordered black all around red. as it past over i looked back and bright light i first saw about ten seconds or so before was gone so i just watched the other object until it was gone
content.summary: Triangle sharp edged craft dull grey

content.detailedDescription:
I had let one of my dogs out when i observed the same orange glowing sphere as i saw a band of on 11/7 this year.  it appeared stationary at first then quickly climbed about 5 degrees in altitude.  at this point it appeared to hover briefly before resuming climbing in altitude.
the object disappeared in front of my eyes before i could retrieve a camera.  the sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes.  there is no doubt this is the same object as i witnessed 18 days ago but then in a string of pearls configuration of 5 spheres.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Second orange sphere sighting in less than 3 weeks

content.detailedDescription: Tonight 11.24.15, i saw flashing lights in the sky that lasted long enough for me to go inside, get my phone & make a video which i will attach. the light moved across tje sky in flashes.  generally, it was in the se sky, but sometimes due south.  on my way home tonight, my daughter, niece, nephew & i saw a ufo moving slowly from sw to ne.  it had flashing red lights on the back & bottom & green lights around the body of the ship. i said it looked like the u.S.S. enterprise,  my daughter said it looked like a circle with a clear top & my niece said an ice cream cone.  my nephew is 3,  he didn't say much. also, on 11.22.15 my son & i saw a baseball sized ball of light in the southern sky.  the light changed from white to flashes of red, stayed stationary long enough for my son to get me up & have me look, then moved in a small figure 8 & disappeared.
content.summary: Light flashing & moving in night sky

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were at the cemetery with our three-year old son and we took several cell phone pictures while we were there.  later on, after we got home, we were going thru all the pictures and came across a picture that we had accidentally taken and we almost deleted it, until we saw something in the sky next to the sun.  we're not sure what to make of it.  maybe you guys will have an idea what it is.  this was at oakdale memorial park in glendora, ca. in the garden of innocence section on october 10th, 2015 at 4:38pm.  we were visiting our oldest son for what would have been his 4th birthday.
content.summary: Accidental picture.  we didn't notice the picture until hours later when we got home.

content.detailedDescription: Saw object only in the pictures was about the ground all the way above the sun
content.summary: Taking pictures saw the thing in the pictures only

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
First seen driving to work from athol to concord along route 2, heading east. first seen around gardner ma, it was a cloudless sky around 7:30 am, and i saw what looked like a star in the glow of the sun. that was obviously odd as no other stars were visible/would be visible at that time. i noticed it would glow occasionally, and i first thought it might be a blimp/plane reflecting the sun as it's so high up and there are no clouds. i lose sight of it but about 20 minutes down the road i see it again, this time with more glowing. the glow was a cooler color, almost white blue, not like what it would look like if the sun was reflecting off of it which would be of a warmer/orangey color. i continue to see it as i progress down route 2, east bound, on and off. this is also when i begin to noticed that it disappears randomly. i have seen this thing two days last week, and two days this past week, only during the daytime. my commute consists of when the sun is coming up and right when it's going down. as of november 24, i've noticed seeing it closer to where i live, as well as it disappearing and reappearing more frequently. november 23, i saw it for the first time on my commute home from work. heading northbound, always a cloudless sky. driving west through gardner, roughly 3:30pm it appears out of nowhere in the middle of the sky as a bright light, like a star, then dims, and then suddenly vanishes again. was probably about 5 seconds altogether. i only see them when i'm driving so i don't dare try and take any pictures. however i have seen planes and helicopters during these experiences and i can rule out what i'm seeing as being those. there are no contrails, and no visible recognizable shape.

i've never seen anything like this and i've grown up in this area never seeing this before. white orbish light, about the size of a star that changes in intensity with whiteish/blueish glowing, dims, and is able to disappear/appear out of nothing. it's getting to the point i almost dread my commute now, because i know i'm most likely going to see these strange things again.
content.summary: Looked like a star at first, but next to the sun, cloudless sky, would glow/shine like a spotlight with cool color, vanish/reappear randomly

content.detailedDescription: A wall of light stopped me. for some reason i looked away and looked to the night sky i dont know why then a ufo about 30 feet acrossed came over my head at tree top level it had a bent bar of light behind it with 3 rectangle bars of light then another bent bar of light i turned around to see if my friend was seeing this but now the wall of light was gone and it was black behind me like nothing there and my friend said latter that he saw two grays come out of the bush and one stood right behind me i did not see them . the disk kept stopping and moving forward then it stopped and turned sideways i could see the dome on top . when we got back my friend noticeisd that we were missing time i allways wonted to see a real ufo but when it happened my mouth was on the ground .My friend still dose not want to take about it . it happend in 04 in a town called auther i wish i could show you the spot its right out of a movie . if you wont to know more get back to me. thanks
content.summary: My friend heard a voice in his head to take me up the hill from his camp . he did not tell me about this and more till one and a half years latter . for me it started with a ball of light i got out of  the cart we were in to look at it and a wall of ligh

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2 a.M. in august 2011 i was at a friends house, it was very hot so we had decided to get in his outdoor in ground pool but, due to the late time of night we had to be very quiet so we wouldn't wake neighbors.  we were each in our own inter tube just floating around in the dark looking up at the sky and not talking.  i noticed a gold or bright yellow ball of light coming out of the west up in the sky heading our direction.  it was so incredibly bright that i couldn't make out the outline or a shape other than a ball, it was moving pretty fast, faster than airplane you see up in the sky. it just had the one glowing color all over it with no pulsing.  it also seemed rather large, but i could be mistaken, it was hard to judge how high up it was so the size would depend on that information.  it reminded me of a full moon but was about half that size.  both my friend and i had the impression that it had a definite destination, it also seemed to have a path it was following, it wasn't falling or on fire or changing direction, just flying a particular path.  it passed over our heads and headed roughly towards boise, idaho.  i watched it until i couldn't see it anymore then it was gone.  i asked my friend, "what was that?" and he replied, "i have no idea".
content.summary: While in a pool late at night and friend and i observed a gold/bright yellow ball of light fly over his house

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq, with witness on the phone, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809, on nov.24th, 2015

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
on september 7th, 2015 while driving on highway 26, near deming new mexico, i saw a hugh silver disc hovering in the sky at about 35,000 feet high. the saucer ship was sitting motionless at an angle where i could not tell it was a saucer. i observed from my position the ship was level with the ground or earth but was tilted if seen from the east or west. my estimate on the altitude this saucer was sitting is probably pretty close. i remembered reading something in the journal, about a deming n,m.Sighting. it was the march 2015 issue. that photo shows a saucer very high and very small. that photo may be the same saucer i saw. a commercial jet at that altitude would definitely not be seen except for a possible con-trail.I wonder how many of similar huge saucer craft have been seen in our sky. knowing the effective camouflage evolving around the saucer i saw, there could be thousands just sitting there that we may never see.
i have enclosed a drawing of the saucer ship.
content.summary: On september 7th, 2015 while driving near demming new mexico, i saw a hugh silver disc hovering in the sky at about 35,000 feet.

content.detailedDescription:
i was illegally burning garbage in the city of wausau with two other guys. one of the guys told me to look at the sky just over my house, so i did. i was shocked to see a huge black triangle silently floating just over my house. i stood frozen as it turned and slowly came at us. it dropped even lower as it descended on us. it blocked out the sky and i didn't even turn my head to see all three corners. i just stared at it's center and noticed the lights changing color and intensity, but didn't turn my head. i was frozen or seemingly caught in a time warp where nothing changed. the bugs didn't make sounds, the wind stopped, i couldn't even think...Just like time had stopped. after what seemed like only 20 seconds, the triangle turned and slowly drifted south of us and silently disappeared behind the fox55 television towers.
    the two guys were friends of mine. however, after this happened, i never spoke to either friend ever again. ken walked away and went home, dave stumbled away and never heard from again. i couldn't walk right so i slowly locked the gate to the yard and went straight to bed. 
    the next morning i couldn't remember anything. i tried for hours, but no memory. i walked to the yard to look around. then i went home and still couldn't remember anything from the night before. i finally had a feeling of seeing something in the sky, so i really thought about it until i remember seeing a triangle. 
     within a week or so, all the veins in my left leg blew up and collapsed. they hung out of my leg like water balloons. the first two doctors wanted to remove my leg from the knee down. a third doctor in marshfield's st. joseph hospital removed the affected veins and i can still walk. 
    i still have never heard from my drummer dave or my neighbor ken. i have this feeling that something really bad happened to me that night, but i can't remember. i wish someone would hypnotize me to find out, but i don't know who will do this for me. 
    also, when i woke up the next morning, my girlfriend told me that i went to bed really late. i remember opening a beer at 10:00 at night and starting burning the roofing material. all the piles were still scattered around the yard, all the beer still in the case, and the fire pit was entirely out when the triangle floated away. usually my fire pit would take an hour or more to burn off enough that i could add more.
    when i left, i remember thinking, "they let me live". 
if there is any way of finding out what happened to me for about a 2 hour loss of time, please let me know. i have had the feeling since that they are still taking me. i've had the strangest injuries in the last few years. things that wouldn't hurt someone, can cause me great injury. please help me get some answers.
thank you:
kevin boyles
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle hovered just over our heads for unknown time

content.detailedDescription: Driving along a major highway (qew highway) 3:45 am going to work.  the lights appeared between lake ontario and the highway just in front of my car.  4 or 5 very bright lights flashing almost blinding when i saw them.  they were in a row. i made a mental note to calm down and make sure i was seeing what it was i was seeing.  i tried to see the reflection of the object behind the lights but the lights were too bright so i waited to see what i could when the lights were out.  it look like projections sticking out and at the end of each projection there was a light.  i couldn't see what the projections were attached to at the far end.  it was too black.  i didn't know what it was but i know i was extremely nervous.  i watched the object continue on it's path between the highway and the lake from my driver side view mirror.  it was too low to be seen in the rear view mirror.  the lights disappeared when it went around a slight bend in the road.
content.summary: Driving and object appeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was home, watching tv late at 11:30 pm. i heard a loud engine sound and went to window facing my street. from the side of my bldg, i heard the loud sound.. i thought it was a plane engine sound.  then as i looked out my window, i saw 2 tall large triangle shaped crafts. they looked facing me, so i could only see one side of these 2 crafts, as they traveled slowly, still with the loud engine noise. i first thought there was mechanical issues. there was rows of bright lights or lit windows on the whole flat surface facing me .  it continued traveling out of my view across the road toward the next town.  i didn't call about it till the following morning.
content.summary: Heard loud engine noise. i went to window, saw 2 tall triangle crafts with rows of lights on whole flat side. it was a few 100 feet above the pine trees , moving slowly out of view.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)

content.detailedDescription: I installed a game camera on our farmhouse for security reasons because we are there infrequently.  i checked the camera about a week after the photo was taken and saw the object on one photo.  the camera is motion sensitive and takes one picture only every minute so the object was either hovering or falling.  the camera is pointed to the driveway with woods behind approximately 60 feet.  i have no idea what this object is.  hopefully, you will be able to blow up the image like i can on my small digital camera to wee the detail.
content.summary: Object caught on security camera.

content.detailedDescription: i was working in santa rosa beach on the 23rd of november  when i saw a view of the gulf that i thought looked beautiful. i quickly took 4-5 photos and went about my day. later when i looked at the photos i noticed something black on the horizon. when i zoomed in i was shocked to find a triangle shaped object with 3 prominent black dots in the corners. when i zoomed in i saw the same object, except that the shape had significantly changed in each photo. each photo was taken within a minute of the others. i thought at first maybe it was a parasailer but it was way too far out and there was absolutely no hint of color. this is a military town with hurlburt field being a special forces training site. and eglin air force base being one of the largest in the country. i have been here for 15 years scene the areas they fly and what they look like and i had never seen something like that.
content.summary: Object was not noticed until i reviewed taken photos.

content.detailedDescription: At 4am i woke and couldn't get back to sleep. frustrated i looked out my window to the east and noticed a bright light. i decided to get dressed and go look closer. using my star app it seems i saw jupiter or mars. then i decided to look at the moon and watch the stars since i was already outside, hoping it would make me tired. the temperature was 27degrees, a bit chilly with a slight wind coming from the east. i stood behind my garden shed to block the breeze and then decided to play with my phone camera and photograph the moon, since it was so clear out. only a few high thin clouds. i propped my phone up on a post and took multiple photos. upon reviewing them i noticed a blue round light near the moon which appears to have moved from above the moon to the right hand side then it blurs out. all the photos were taken within seconds of each other. not sure what it was but neat anyhow.
content.summary: Woke up noticed a bright light went outside to look
